node.title: Windscribe Accepts BTT. Browse the Web Privately Like It Was Meant to Be
node.content:
BitTorrent is happy to announce that Windscribe VPN accepts BitTorrent Token (BTT) as payment, making it available as a secure payment option for its VPN service. With servers in over 110 cities and 64 countries, Windscribe supports 6 different VPN protocols. Users can run Windscribe on any device, including Windows and Mac computers, iOS and Android phones, TV boxes, Chrome and Firefox browsers and most routers. 

“Since 2016, Windscribe has been offering premium VPN services to users all over the world,” said Yegor Sak, CEO of Windscribe. “With the popularity of cryptocurrencies growing strong over the last few years, we are happy to accept BTT, TRX and other leading cryptocurrencies as payment for Windscribe products.” 

For added privacy and security, Windscribe offers a browser extension that can be run on top of VPN, including features like geo-location API spoofing, timezone spoofing, ad blocking, tracking cookie removal and more.

To purchase Windscribe using BTT, please visit https://windscribe.com/upgrade, select a plan, then select Crypto Currencies when you reach the payment section of the checkout process.
